text: Yulia Lipnitskaya (; born on 5 June 1998) is a Russian figure skater. She is a 2014 Olympic champion in the figure skating team event, the 2014 World Championships silver medalist, the 2014 European champion, the 2013/14 Grand Prix Final silver medalist, the 2012 World Junior champion. == References == ==Other websites== * Julia Lipnitskaia at the International Skating Union * Yulia Lipnitskaya at the 2014 Winter Olympics Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Russian figure skaters Category:Olympic gold medalists for Russia Category:People with anorexia
title: Yulia Lipnitskaya
